content: Hello Everyone, I'm very new to SMART on FHIR and learning the stuff. I'm looking on implementing Smart on FHIR Authorization Server with the ability to talk to an external IDP for Authentication utilizing SAML/ Open ID. Are there any sample java implementations that I can look to get started at or any thoughts on how to go about it would be greatly appreciated

The short answer for production is not out of the box.

The closest will be Igia on KeyCloak, see: https://igia.github.io/docs/igia-keycloak~introduction
But watch this panel discussion first: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179170-smart/topic/Keycloak.20for.20SMART.20authz/near/215912381

For a list of options, see:
Confluence: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/SMART+on+FHIR+server+implementations
Discussion: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179170-smart/topic/Any.20OAuth.202.20Server.20with.20Open.20ID.20Connect.20.2B.20SMART.20on.20FHIR.20App/near/226696852

PS. Welcome to the FHIR community. :smiley_cat:
